item.title: 阿波罗与英国石油公司达成 10 亿美元协议，为跨亚得里亚海天然气管道股份提供资金
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）周一表示，该公司已与英国能源巨头英国石油公司（BP）签署了一项价值 10 亿美元的协议，为其在跨亚得里亚海天然气管道中的股份提供资金。【原文：Apollo Global Management has signed a $1 billion deal with British energy major BP to fund its stake in the Trans Adriatic natural gas pipeline, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 对冲基金转向购买银行、保险和贸易公司，高盛集团称
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）的一份报告显示，银行、保险和贸易公司重获青睐，对冲基金上周以 2023 年 6 月以来最快的速度抢购这些公司的股票。【原文：Banks, insurance and trading firms returned to favour as hedge funds last week snapped up these company stocks at the fastest pace since June 2023, a Goldman Sachs note showed.】

item.title: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）称大众汽车可能因削减产能而计提 30-40 亿欧元准备金
item.description: 券商杰富瑞（Jefferies）在与大众汽车管理层座谈后发表的一份报告中写道，大众汽车最早可能在第四季度为削减产能计划计提数十亿欧元的准备金。【原文：Volkswagen may book billions of euros in provisions for planned capacity cuts as early as the fourth quarter, brokerage Jefferies wrote in a note after accompanying the carmaker's management.】

item.title: 意大利私人银行 Banca Generali 竞购经纪人 Intermonte
item.description: 意大利私人银行通用银行（Banca Generali）周一表示，将以 9800 万欧元（1.09 亿美元）全现金收购 Intermonte，将这家米兰经纪商私有化，并将其服务直接提供给通用银行的客户。【原文：Italian private bank Banca Generali on Monday said it was launching a 98 million euro ($109 mln) all-cash buyout bid for Intermonte , to take the Milanese broker private and direct its services at Banca Generali clients.】

item.title: 高盛和花旗集团将中国 2024 年经济增长预期下调至 4.7
item.description: 高盛集团和花旗集团将中国全年经济增长预期下调至 4.7%，此前这个世界第二大经济体的工业产出在 8 月份放缓至五个月来的最低点。【原文：Goldman Sachs and Citigroup have lowered their full-year projections for China's economic growth to 4.7%, after the world's second-largest economy's industrial output slowed to a five-month low in August.】

item.title: Orcel 告诉《德国商报》，裕信银行和德国商业银行的合并将为所有利益相关者带来更多价值
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（Unicredit）首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 周一在接受《德国商报》采访时表示，意大利联合信贷银行与德国商业银行的合并将为所有利益相关者带来更多价值，并将在德国银行业市场上形成更强大的竞争对手。【原文：A merger of Italy's Unicredit and Germany's Commerzbank would add value for all stakeholders and create a much stronger competitor in the German banking market, Unicredit CEO Andrea Orcel told Handelsblatt in an interview published on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储降息为何与全球市场息息相关
item.description: 本周三，美联储将宣布四年来的首次降息，这一举动将在美国以外引起广泛反响。【原文：When the Federal Reserve delivers a widely-anticipated interest rate cut on Wednesday, its first in four years, the move will resonate well beyond the United States.】

item.title: 早间竞标美联储悬而未决
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 内部备忘录称，普华永道正在为中国的 "高质量 "业务进行投资
item.description: 普华永道正在进行 "切实的投资"，以确保这家 "四大 "公司在中国拥有高质量和可持续的业务，普华永道在给员工的一份备忘录中说，中国监管机构周五对该公司的大陆业务部门处以创纪录的罚款。【原文：PwC is making "tangible investments" to ensure the Big Four firm has high quality and sustainable business in China, it said in a memo to staff after Chinese regulators on Friday hit the company's mainland unit with a record penalty.】

item.title: 油价因美联储降息前景而上扬
item.description: 周一早盘，油价在美国本周降息预期的推动下上扬，但涨幅因飓风弗朗辛过后美国恢复供应和中国数据疲软而受限。【原文：Oil prices edged up in early trade on Monday amid expectations of a U.S. interest rate cut this week, though gains were capped by U.S. supply resumptions following Hurricane Francine and weaker China data.】

item.title: 美联储面临紧要关头，亚洲股市人心惶惶
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市谨慎开盘，本周几乎可以肯定美国将开始宽松周期，唯一的问号是削减的幅度，市场对大幅削减的可能性存在分歧。【原文：Asian stocks made a cautious start on Monday in a week that is almost certain to see the start of an easing cycle in the United States with the only question mark being the size of the cut, with markets split on the chance of an outsized move.】

item.title: 市场对美联储降息议论纷纷，货币无精打采
item.description: 周一，日元在年内最高水平附近徘徊，市场参与者对美联储本周晚些时候几乎肯定会降息的预期规模举棋不定。【原文：The yen lounged around its highest levels for the year on Monday in trading thinned by a holiday in Japan, as market participants vacillated over the expected size of the Federal Reserve's almost-certain rate cut later this week.】

item.title: 联邦调查局称正在调查另一起暗杀特朗普未遂事件，股市期货和美元持稳
item.description: 美国联邦调查局（FBI）称，在特朗普位于佛罗里达州西棕榈滩的高尔夫球场外发生了一起看似未遂的暗杀事件，随后共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）平安无事，周日美国股票期货和美元汇率变化不大。【原文：U.S. stock futures and the dollar were little changed on Sunday after Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump was safe following what the FBI said appeared to be an assassination attempt outside Trump's golf course in West Palm Beach, Florida.】

item.title: 晨祷：中国的阴霾与华尔街的喧嚣
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 监管机构称美国墨西哥湾五分之一的原油和 28% 的天然气处于停产状态
item.description: 美国近海能源监管机构周日表示，飓风弗朗辛过后，美国墨西哥湾联邦水域近五分之一的原油产量和28%的天然气产量仍处于停产状态。【原文：Nearly a fifth of crude oil production and 28% of natural gas output in U.S. Gulf of Mexico federal waters remained offline in the aftermath of Hurricane Francine, the U.S. offshore energy regulator said on Sunday.】

item.title: 以色列 8 月 CPI 跃升至 3.6% 的 10 个月新高
item.description: 以色列中央统计局周日公布的数据显示，以色列 8 月份的通货膨胀率飙升至近一年以来的最高水平，这降低了以色列在短期内下调更多利率的可能性。【原文：Israel's inflation rate surged in August to its highest rate in nearly a year, data from the Central Bureau of Statistics showed on Sunday, reducing the likelihood of more interest rate cuts anytime soon.】

item.title: 秘鲁 7 月经济同比增长 4.47
item.description: 秘鲁政府统计局（INEI）周日发布报告称，7 月份秘鲁经济同比增长 4.47%。【原文：Peru's economy expanded 4.47% in July compared with the same month last year, the government's INEI statistics agency reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 美国铝业公司将以 11 亿美元的价格出售其在 Ma'aden 合资企业中持有的 25.1% 股份
item.description: 美国铝业公司周日表示，将以 11 亿美元的价格向 Ma'aden 公司出售其在 Ma'aden 合资企业中 25.1% 的股份。【原文：U.S. aluminium maker Alcoa said on Sunday that it would sell a 25.1% stake in its Ma'aden joint venture to Ma'aden for $1.1 billion.】

item.title: 加拿大航空公司与飞行员工会达成协议，避免了罢工
item.description: 加拿大航空公司周日早些时候表示，该公司已与飞行员工会就一项为期四年的新集体协议达成临时协议，该协议将避免近期的罢工或停工。【原文：Air Canada said early on Sunday it had reached a tentative agreement with its pilots union over a new four-year collective agreement, in a deal that will avert a near-term strike or lockout.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，由于对经济增长的担忧加剧，加拿大央行行长提高了降息前景
item.description: 据《金融时报》周日报道，加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）为加快降息步伐敞开了大门。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem opened the door to increasing the pace of interest rate cuts, the Financial Times reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 工会领导人称，工人要求提高工资，波音罢工可能会持续下去
item.description: 工会领导人乔恩-霍尔登（Jon Holden）周六在接受美国国家公共广播电台（NPR）采访时说，波音公司的罢工 "可能会持续一段时间"，因为工人们相信他们可以获得更大的工资增长和更好的养老金。【原文：A strike at Boeing "could go on for a while" as workers are confident they can get bigger wage increases and an improved pension, union leader Jon Holden said in an interview with National Public Radio (NPR) on Saturday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，阿克塞尔-施普林格与 KKR 接近达成 135 亿美元的分拆协议
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周六援引四位知情人士的话报道，德国亿万富翁马蒂亚斯-多普弗纳（Mathias Doepfner）和 KKR 即将达成一项协议，分拆传媒巨头阿克塞尔-施普林格（Axel Springer）。【原文：German billionaire Mathias Doepfner and KKR are nearing a deal to split up the media giant Axel Springer, the Financial Times reported on Saturday, citing four people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 风暴过后，美国墨西哥湾近 30% 的石油产量停产
item.description: 美国近海能源监管机构称，飓风弗朗辛过后，周六美国墨西哥湾近 30% 的原油生产和 41% 的天然气生产仍处于停产状态。【原文：Nearly 30% of U.S. Gulf of Mexico crude oil production and 41% of its natural gas production remained offline on Saturday following Hurricane Francine, the U.S. offshore energy regulator said.】

item.title: 阿联酋不打算与美国重启 F-35 战斗机谈判
item.description: 阿联酋政府的一位高级官员周六表示，无论11月谁入主白宫，阿联酋都不会恢复与美国就价值数十亿美元的F-35战机交易进行谈判。【原文：The United Arab Emirates does not expect to resume talks with the U.S. about a multi-billion dollar deal for F-35 warplanes, irrespective of who is elected to the White House in November, a senior UAE government official said on Saturday.】

item.title: 迪斯尼与 DirecTV 达成协议，恢复 1100 万卫星电视用户的节目服务
item.description: 沃尔特-迪斯尼（Walt Disney）和 DirecTV 周六宣布双方已达成原则性协议，恢复向卫星电视供应商的 1100 多万用户提供大学橄榄球和其他节目。【原文：Walt Disney and DirecTV announced they have reached an agreement in principle on Saturday, restoring college football and other programming to the satellite TV provider's more than 11 million subscribers.】

item.title: 首席执行官称，受波音罢工影响，瑞安航空明年夏季可能减少五架飞机
item.description: 瑞安航空集团首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）周六表示，波音公司工人的长期罢工可能会使该公司到明年夏季接收的飞机数量从预计的 25 架减少到 20 架。【原文：Ryanair Group CEO Michael O'Leary said on Saturday a prolonged Boeing workers' strike may cut the number of aircraft it receives by next summer to 20 from an anticipated 25.】

item.title: 中国反对美国加征关税，誓言采取措施捍卫本国企业利益
item.description: 中国商务部周六发表声明称，北京坚决反对美国对中国进口商品加征关税，并敦促美国立即纠正其 "错误行为"，取消对中国商品加征的所有关税。【原文：Beijing firmly opposes U.S. tariff hikes on Chinese imports, China's commerce ministry said in a statement on Saturday, urging the U.S. to immediately correct its "wrongdoings" and lift all tariffs imposed on Chinese goods.】

item.title: 印度对亚马逊和 Flipkart 的反垄断调查结果如何？
item.description: 印度的反垄断调查发现，亚马逊和沃尔玛旗下的 Flipkart 违反了当地的竞争法，它们优先照顾某些卖家，优先刊登某些商品，并大幅打折，损害了其他公司的利益。【原文：Indian antitrust investigations have found that Amazon and Walmart's Flipkart violated local competition laws by giving preference to some sellers, prioritising certain listings, and steeply discounting products, hurting other companies.】

item.title: 独家：印度指责三星、小米与亚马逊和 Flipkart 勾结
item.description: 据路透社看到的监管报告称，三星、小米和其他智能手机公司与亚马逊和沃尔玛旗下的 Flipkart 相互勾结，在这两家电子商务公司的印度网站上独家发布产品，违反了反垄断法。【原文：Samsung, Xiaomi and other smartphone companies colluded with Amazon and Walmart's Flipkart to exclusively launch products on the e-commerce firms' Indian websites in breach of antitrust laws, according to regulatory reports seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 中国1-8月外商直接投资同比下降31.5
item.description: 中国商务部周六表示，1-8月，外商对华直接投资达5,801.9亿元人民币（818.0亿美元），同比下降31.5%。【原文：Foreign direct investment into China amounted to 580.19 billion yuan ($81.80 billion) in January-August, down 31.5% from the same period last year, the Chinese commerce ministry said on Saturday.】
